welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Holborn, the charming heart of London! Immerse yourself in the rich history, bustling streets, and vibrant culture of this city. Enjoy your stay and discover all the wonders it has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport handles all flights and provides various services for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at London City Airport caters to private and business aviation needs, providing a luxurious and efficient experience.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting 'LCY Free WiFi' and following the prompts.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northolt Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggin Hill Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Biggin Hill Airport caters to private and business jet operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly Star Alliance airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: One of the oldest terminals at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly Oneworld airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly SkyTeam airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The main terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly British Airways and its partners.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, with a 45-minute time limit per session.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Gatwick Airport serves mainly domestic and short-haul flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Gatwick Airport serves mainly international and long-haul flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport for up to 90 minutes.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Luton Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 is currently under construction and will be used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Premium WiFi options are also available for purchase.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rochester Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Rochester Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Stansted Airport handles both domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Satellite Terminal
terminals.description: The satellite terminal at Stansted Airport is primarily used for low-cost airlines and budget flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
